greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total number of prime factors of n-th number of the form 3^i*5^j.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: s = {}; m = 12; Do[n = 5^k; While[n <= 5^m, AppendTo[s, n]; n *= 3], {k, 0, m}]; PrimeOmega[Union[s]] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 06 2020 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 18 2005
